title: Text-To-Speech
description: This project aims to create a high-quality Text-to-Speech system using deep learning models like Tacotron 2 and WaveNet. It includes a web app built with React, styled with Tailwind CSS, and a Django backend.

title: Image Fusion
description: This project focuses on merging multi-focus images to enhance visual quality using deep learning techniques. It features a user-friendly interface for uploading, visualizing, and downloading fused images.

title: Darija-to-English Translator
description: This project is a web application for translating Darija to English using LSTM-based machine learning models. Built with Django for the backend, Bootstrap for the frontend, and designed for real-time text translation.
